description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Ajaccio vs Amiens SC in the Ligue 2
title: Ajaccio vs Amiens SC: Ligue 2 stats & head-to-head
title_page: Ajaccio vs Amiens SC: Ligue 2 stats & head-to-head - BBC Sport
maintext:
Full Time
Second Half ends, Ajaccio 2, Amiens 1.
Post
Arsène Kouassi (Ajaccio) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Post
Attempt blocked. Rayan Lutin (Amiens) left footed shot from outside the box is blocked.
Post
Attempt blocked. Messy Manitu (Amiens) left footed shot from the right side of the box is blocked. Assisted by Antoine Léautey.
Post
Fourth official has announced 4 minutes of added time.
Post
Rémy Vita (Amiens) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Post
Delay over. They are ready to continue.
Post
Delay in match because of an injury Ben Touré (Ajaccio).
Post
Julien Anziani (Ajaccio) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
